# EventGroup.Null field

A special null event group that can be used to stop the [`CurrentEventGroup`](../Actor/CurrentEventGroup.md) from being passed along when [`CreateActor`](../Actor/CreateActor.md) or [`SendEvent`](../Actor/SendEvent.md) is invoked.

```csharp
public static EventGroup Null;
```
